title: Woad scout Quinn and the new Tag Team
body: I think it's rather odd that woad scout quinn has unique Owl sound effects for valor on her abilities and joke, but still has the same sound effect on channeling her new ult as the other quinn skins. I'd much have preferred that they reuse the owl sounds from her other abilities for the new ult sound. As it is the ult sound doesn't support the theme of the skin, and with that cooldown you're going to be hearing it a lot.

replies.body:
Hey Risotadazo! 

Nice catch! We'll see what we can do here! :D
Glad to hear it! Thanks for stopping by.
You should be seeing (hearing?) something on the PBE soon!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EjMtPEVg,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2015-11-14T01:39:29.083+0000)
>
> You should be seeing (hearing?) something on the PBE soon!

Update? Woad Scout Quinn is one of my favourite skins.

I've gone ahead and passed this thread onto one of my friends on Champion Update so he can take a look and grab you an update. (He'll likely reply to the more updated thread you've posted, so check back on there.)

With owls, you really aren't supposed to hear anything, as owls evolved to be really quiet, since they are nocturnal predators. Even their feathers have a special structure to minimize noise from turbulence made by flying. 
Hawks on the other hand have more noises that can be used for the skins, from screeches, to even just the noise of them flying.
Owls sure are stealthy, but they're not quiet 100% of the time. Either that or I've been hearing some other bird make that hooting sound at night....

> [{quoted}](name=Risotadazo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EjMtPEVg,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-13T22:03:43.896+0000)
>
> Owls sure are stealthy, but they're not quiet 100% of the time. Either that or I've been hearing some other bird make that hooting sound at night....

Well, I meant when owls are actually flying about, swooping in on rats and other small prey. And not all owls hoot much either.
So for realism we should make the skin silent when fighting Twitch, yordles etc.?

Yes please! I've been loving this skin but that ult sound effect throws me off every time.
Would be perfect once that gets fixed.
That's a good point. I would even go so far as suggesting that you post this in the bug board
